l'atalier

l'Atalier

Starting with a website I built when I was 12, I've been lucky to indulge my natural curiosity over the past decade+ through the hundreds of projects I've worked on, with some incredible people.

Ongoing:

Spacebar

// Immersive 3D world to collaborate on projects online

CompoNet

// Visualize & survey millions of passive components

Raspresso

// Software-driven espresso machine built from scratch

Voice

// Used by millions of blind people to read everyday things

Retired:

Iris

// Smart campus assistant for college students

Lumos

// Automated eye-disease screening kit

Close

// One of the first real-time COVID dashboards

Droptop

// Full video editing suite for making funny content

BlueTune

// Stream music to a friends phone over bluetooth

MiddleSchoolNotes

// Comprehensive notes for dozens of subjects


... And many, many others that now rest in the graveyard.
